util

Class ImageEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.ImageEditor

  • public class ImageEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    Image editor class. Allows for transforming images/image icons and loads them from resources. Resource path example: For image White.png in folder images.board, path will be images/board/White.png

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  ImageEditor.FlipType
      Enum for flipping images.

        public static java.awt.Image TransparentImage(java.awt.Image img,
                                              int alpha)
        Returns partially transparent copy of image.
        Parameters:
        img - Image
        alpha - transparency setting between 0-255. For lower/higher it will return empty/non edited image

        transparent image

        Parameters:
